author: smuzaffar
body:
- Added missing dependency 
```
>grep -R DataFormats/SiStripDigi DataFormats/SiStripCluster
DataFormats/SiStripCluster/interface/SiStripCluster.h:#include "DataFormats/SiStripDigi/interface/SiStripDigi.h"
```
- Added extra root headers which are needed due to `ROOT::Math::*`https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/c52e2819d7a2bca52273e9c36fc99622313eff71/DataFormats/Math/src/classes_def.xml#L7
title: [RECO] Fixes needed for new root cxxmodules
